author: rhuijben
msg: Extend svn_wc__db_op_mark_resolved() to work as an atomic operation. Enable
resolving tree conflicts and allow adding work items. Remove unneeded records.
(svn_wc__db_op_mark_resolved): ... this function, which now uses a wc
transaction and removes no longer needed ACTUAL records.

author: gstein
msg: Clear the scratch pool within the xml context. This also requires some
debug code to ensure we haven't re-entered the context and might be
claering an outer call's use of the pool.
(START_CALLBACK, END_CALLBACK): helper macros to manipulate the
callback invocation with callback flag markers. clear the scratch
